objects.text: Premium chrome design • Smooth-rolling wheels • Stylish & Portable

product_details.name: Mini Beauty Shopping Cart Organizer - Perfect Makeup Storage Solution
product_details.description:
• Premium chrome-plated metal construction for durability and style
• Authentic shopping cart design with smooth-rolling wheels
• Perfect size for organizing makeup, cosmetics, and beauty tools
• Versatile storage solution for bathroom countertop or vanity
• Fun and decorative way to display your beauty products
• Portable design allows easy movement between rooms
• Ideal gift for makeup enthusiasts and beauty lovers
• Dimensions suitable for storing standard-sized cosmetic products
• Easy to clean and maintain with wipeable surface
• Unique conversation starter and decorative piece for beauty corners

banner_details:
This promotional banner features a vibrant, feminine theme designed to showcase a beauty-related product. The background employs a soft radial gradient transitioning from pale pink to a deeper blush, overlaid with light decorative circles and linear details to create a stylish and polished layout. The banner contains three main text elements: a prominent, bold heading ("heading"), a subheading in a smaller but elegant font ("subheading"), and a product benefit section detailing key features ("description"). A high-resolution image of the product ("product_image") takes center stage. Below, the price is showcased prominently ("price") and a call-to-action button ("cta") with strong contrast prompts users to take action.

**Color Palette:**
- Light Pink (#FFE6F2)
- Medium Pink (#F5C6E6)
- Deep Magenta (#A64D79)
- Dark Plum (#7D2252)
- White (#FFFFFF)
product_color: The product image features a vibrant and colorful arrangement of cosmetics inside a miniature shopping cart. The core color palette includes pastel pink (#F97CAC), electric blue (#1656C1), nude beige (#EED6C4), black (#000000), and glossy silver (#C0C0C0). These colors are strategically used to make the products visually attractive while complementing each other. Pink adds a playful, feminine appeal, blue provides contrast, and nude tones bring warmth. The silver of the cart reflects surrounding colors, creating dynamic blending while preserving sharp highlights. Black elements give definition and focus. This combination of hues would create a lively, modern, and stylish advertisement banner.
